actions.name: Pickpocket
actions.description:
Trigger: The user uses Thief.

Effect: Items stolen with Thief are now added to the user's inventory instead of being dropped on the ground if the user's Equipment Slots are full. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the user freely uses Fling with 0 Power to throw the item towards their Trainer.

actions.name: Thief
actions.description: Effect: On hit, the user steals a random item in the target's [Accessory], [Belt], or [Held] slots and equips it to itself in a [Held] slot. If the user already has a [Held] slot occupied, the stolen item is dropped on the ground in a square adjacent to the user.

system.description: Trigger: The user uses Thief. Effect: Connection - Thief. Items stolen with Thief are now added to the user's inventory instead of being dropped on the ground if the user's Equipment Slots are full. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the user freely uses Fling with 0 Power to throw the item towards their Trainer.
